Text:
WARNING!!! I don't know if its this torrent or the utorrent app itself but I downloaded this and 2 days later Comcast (my ISP) sent me an email saying they know all about it! 
I don't know enough about torrents to know which one it was but I'm going to play it safe by not using utorrent and not using this torrent as well as warning people.
It's probably all the kiddie porn you downloaded rc. You see jebus is always watching and he has a speeddial to Comcast.
rc5924, you, sir, are a lying sack of shit.

Oh, ad rc, if Comcast were stupid enough to have any idea what their customers were DL'ing, there would be a mass exodus from their service, and they would be in deep ass shit. What country do you think you're living in?
LOLZ@rc5924  better throw out your computer, the gov is watching you type >_> xD

Lol whatever you guys, I got the email so download if you want and get caught. You're an idiot if you don't believe this is happening to people all over the place. It was being talked about in the news just a couple months ago.
Those people who were caught were not caught by their cable providers. They were burning dvd's and selling them. That also goes against PB's philosophy of "free if it's in the airwaves".

Also keep in mind, rc, that those DL'ers who refused to pay the $1500.00 dollar fines that were levied had their charges throw out by a court of law. The ones that did pay the fine were proven to be cowards and should not be here. It aint for everyone. Don't forget to seed.
Some of you guys sound like real douche bags cause he is telling the truth. It has happened to me.
Some of you guys sound like real douche. cause he is telling the truth it happened to me.

erich 505 you're a faggot, and an idiot. ISP's CAN and DO know if you're pirating copyrighted material. How the fuck do you think people using napster got caught? Cuz napster turned them in? Dumbass... Like I said you guys might not get caught but I did, so I came here to warn whoever cared to read it
